text: Tang Fei (; born 15 March 1932) is a retired ROC Air Force general and politician. He was the Premier of the Republic of China between May 20 and October 6, 2000 under the Chen Shui-bian government. He worked for the Democratic Progressive Party (DPP), even though he was a member of the Kuomintang (KMT). ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Generals Category:Premiers of the Republic of China on Taiwan
title: Tang Fei
